name: NeoMates
description:
You have to pass through the white portals at the end of each level in order to progress. 

Watch out because there's going to be lots of troubles! If you or your mate, the ball die, you'll lose, so be aware and ready to play!

Thanks to the experimental LAB CAETI-UAI, for telling us about the This is Argentina Jam!

Go on and take a look to the incredible and innovative videogames here: https://live-uai.itch.io/

This videogames was created in a week, because of the "This is Argentina Jam": https://itch.io/jam/this-is-argentina

CONTROLS (Explained In-Game):

- A and D to move

- S to charge the ball and to shoot the cannon.

- R to restart

- ESC to go back to the menu.
